content.text: Big_Pharmai celebrates the launch of the first AI Agent built on the BADDIE framework.
dankvr introduces a new concept by turning AI x VC into a game show, with a trailer release today and more information to follow tomorrow.
Mind AI partners with ElizaOS to enhance AI capabilities in processing social signals and market data.
Fleek announces that AI Agent APIs are now live, allowing for easy deployment and control through API calls.
Nillion Network extends its integration to unlock capabilities for AI agents beyond human users.
Reality Spiral announces the soft launch of a new UI for agent interaction.
Ai16z token observes a significant decline with a daily change of -7.28%, current price at $0.7965.
Bitcoin surges dramatically with a daily increase of 1037%, reaching a current price of $104,643.
Ethereum price drops slightly with a daily change of -11.18%, current price at $3293.69.
Solana experiences a minimal decrease with a daily change of -0.52%, current price at $251.21.
